channel.title: blog on Hi.
channel.description: Recent content in blog on Hi.

item.title: The start of something great.
item.description: Hey, it’s great to see you here! This site is something I’m excited to launch and I can’t wait until I can look back on this from a better place. I’m going to be using this site to showcase my tech skills, and other times as a blog for my thoughts. I’m already working on the next post and there’s nothing I wouldn’t love more than you coming back to check it out.
